anchors.text: Since you have access to a file system (/home/bozertron/), we can use Python to render the "Code City" directly in your command line. It will use ASCII art to visualize the Fiefdoms, Gold/Blue states, and Thresholds—proving the logic works without needing a web browser.
# Logic: Is this point inner (Wisdom) or outer (Gold)?
